评论概述: Great gift item and decently warm
评论详情: Got this as a birthday gift and it was a hit.  The fit is great, really flattering.  It's also surprisingly warm for how it looks.  Mom loves it, so I'm happy with the purchase.  Definitely recommend!

Definitely runs larger!  I wear and purchase many brands of 3x sweatshirts.  This particular one runs at least one size larger. Ordered my first one 3x and major floated in it. Ordered 2nd one a 2x. It's poifect. I like the sweatshirt, even tho no hood ties or advertised kangaroo pocket.  Its soft n good quality. The bottom band is nice n loose around (my huge) the hips. Please make em w/the advertised kangaroo pocket tho!

This is exactly the kind of oversized hoodie I was in the market for. I love the cut of it and the fit, and it is super soft on the inside! I bought a size up the first time, and bought a second one my regular size (I decided to keep both, but no need to size up for a comfy fit in my opinion).

I love this sweatshirt so much, but haven’t washed it yet after receiving only yesterday.  I’m really hoping it doesn’t shrink, because if it doesn’t, it will be my new favorite.  Buying another in a different color, but as soon as I wash the first one - if it shrinks - the new color will be sent back.  So comfy and cozy, love the side slits for my ample hips (😝), and I probably could have gotten one size smaller, but love the roomy fit of one size larger too much to return for anything smaller. 🥰If it doesn’t shrink, Hanes definitely needs to make these in a lot bigger color selection, because it’s so hard to find sweatshirts like these for women that don’t strangle your midsection as a heavier woman.
Gave to my daughter for Christmas.  She loves it.  She likes the longer length.
Very nice sweatshirt fits great and added an iron on to dress up a little.

It's a nice thick hoodie, more of a tunic styled and oversized. I'm 5'3", 150 lbs, and a size 8. I ordered a L based on the measurements and it was definitely oversized, but that's how I wanted it. If you want it more fitted size down a size. The sleeves are short compared to the size of the hoodie, long enough for me, the length hits me almost mid thigh. Be aware there are no pockets, go by the pictures and not the description.
I thought I was getting the dark blue, nope.
Very comfortable and warm! I normally wear a large because I like oversized and this was perfectly oversized and great with leggings. Washes nice! I immediately ordered another in pink!
Really love this hoodie and love the hem with the split sides - much more flattering on me than the traditional sweatshirt hem.
Nice and comfy,  seems to run a little large but perfect for a sweatshirt.
It's medium weight is perfect over another layer when it's cold, or on it's own if just cool.  Very soft, laundered and machine dried very well.  Just one downfall ... no pockets!
I sized up and it swallows me. Don't size up! But it feels great
Cute pullover, soft and warm. But it does NOT have a “kanga” pocket, no pocket whatsoever.

I bought my usual size and it's giant.  I'm already a 4x.  I definitely don't want to look bigger!  The sleeves are enormous and the under arm part goes way down your side.  It's not fitted to the arm at all.  This makes me look like a big, blue flying squirrel.This is SO comfortable though.  Ordinarily I'd return it, but maybe I'll keep it for lounging at home.  I would not repurchase.P.S. The Plus Size Eco Fleece pants are huge too.  I recommend sizing down.

There is nothing special here. Just your basic Hanes Fleece Hoodie. We bought these from the time I was a kid for the fall and then to have in school for PE class. It’s still the same hasn’t changed. Which can be a good thing considering you know what to expect. They don’t shrink, they last long, they keep you warm, almost too warm after you’ve run the track for gym class but also absorbs the sweat and keeps you warm thereafter. The weight isn’t too heavy but the range of colors is quite limited. I would say the value for the money of what your spending for the quality of the merchendise is a good deal. You can also find matching pants.
Wow ! An amazing hoodie! Soft and comfortable! Keeps me warm!
Comfy and cozy and looks good on my plus sized person.  Like the way the style hangs!

There is no pockets on this hoodie... i am keeping them because i like them.. but if its says kanga pocket..then there should be pockets... o and i would have given it 4 stars but due to pocket missing it got docked a point!..

Nice hoodie.  It's longer so it covers the hips without the band around your waist.  Being plus size that is appreciated.  I also like the neck. It is cut a bit bigger so it's not choking like other hoodies can be.  I want more in pretty colors!
This hoodie by Hanes is soft and comfortable.  It washes well and I love the oversized fit.
They’re very comfortable- but the dimensions of fit didn’t quite work.

评论概述: Good quality and what I was looking for
评论详情: This is exactly what I was looking for - a comfortable, cozy sweatshirt to wear around the house.  I can tell it was well made and a good value for the money.  It is oversized, but that is what I wanted.
Loved this hoodie it was so soft and comfortable

Love the fit and side slits allowing it to hang loose for over leggings or jeans. Disappointed that description says kanga pocket and there is no pocket. I bought black and was not noticeable in pictures that it was not there. you can see it has no pocket in other colors. probably would have still purchased without the pocket but description needs updated. or better yet put a pocket.
Way to oversized for my liking, and neckline to tight for me
I bought one and it was a great fit.  I like it alittle loose for the gym and as a coverup over another shirt as another layer during the cooler months
I gave this to my niece as part of her birthday present. She loves the color, the softness, and the fit, so I guess it was a good purchase.

This is a simple closet staple from Hanes, made out of classic sweatshirt material. It's got a loose, slouchy fit, making it perfect for lounging around the house - but this is in no way fitted, so think of it as a casual garment that fills the role of an old band hoodie rather than as a fashion statement.  The listing promises a kanga pocket, and as far as I can tell, that isn't present here. The photos in the listing are more accurate to what I received than the listing text, so I'd go by the visuals instead.  With a pocket, this would have been five stars, but as is, it's still an okay hoodie. It hasn't become a favorite, though, and I probably wouldn't order this again.
Beautiful color and loose fitting hoodie worked well for those chilly nights. Would recommend this brand and item as iT suited my needs. Not too heavy not too light.
While a front pocket would be nice, this is so comfy to relax in after a shower at the end of the day.
Fleece is shedding. I bought three of the for a trip I’m taking in May to Alaska. Poor quality prevented me from using them.
It was odd fit for me. A bit too baggy
Comfortable, cozy, washes well, just what I needed.

评论概述: Bargain and super soft and warm
评论详情: Warm and cozy sweat jacket. Bought as a gift for my mom who loves it. Maintained it softness after washing too. Color is nice and didn’t fade from washing. Would definitely buy again if needed
Wished it had a front pocket
I’m glad I purchased this hoodie. It’s a good oversized hoodie if that’s what you’re looking for. I work from home so comfy clothes are nice.
Big and bulky And didn't come with the kangaroo pockets like advertised Doesn't wash well Gets very linty fast
I watched to love this, but it’s huge! The small could fit 3 people, it’s not cut like a women’s sweatshirt either. Sadly disappointed
It is awesome for my fuller figure and I love it so much I got it in three colors

I like the shirt and wear it often the only negative and this often happens with sweatshirts it shrinks especially in length so I’d upsize it. Or as I do, hand stretch it when it comes out of the dryer super soft inside, nice weight sweatshirt & comfy. Great with leggings with a high side slit which I really like.
Buena calidad, pero el talle no corresponde; pedi un M y parecia un L. Tener en cuenta; despues lo demas ok.

I thought I was going to love this long hoodie, but I was disappointed. The size indicated by the size chart was way off. I bought size XL (bust 40-42) and it was huuuuuge! I measured from underarm seam to underarm seam and it was 27", so 54" around, not 42". Other than being a big giant clown shirt, it was cute and comfortable. I recommend sizing down.
These are so comfy, just wish they had a pocket and came in more colors. But very comfy to wear.
This sweatshirt is so comfortable and washes well.  It is very well made.  The oversized sweatshirt is very comfortable to wear with jeans or sweats.

The material of this hoodie is nice, soft and warm. It would have been perfect if the shape was like a normal hoodie. Instead, the shoulders are huge, like 3/4 inches more PER SHOULDER and the arms a very baggy and not flattering at all. Returned.
Soft and warm.  I wash and hang to dry.

评论概述: Does not have a Kanga pocket
评论详情: I really liked the fit and how comfortable the sweatshirt is when wearing it. However it said it had a pocket which is one reason I purchased the item. It does not. I would purchase the item again even though the pocket is not there.

This sweatshirt is very warm, which I like. But it looks like it is put together wrong because it is shorter in the back than in the front. Based on the photos in Amazon, I expected it to be longer in the back. I’m too lazy to return it and try again.
Great baggy fit 👌.

评论概述: Hoodie was great, but pilled already upon arrival

When I received the black one, the sleeves and a little on the chest was already pilled, which I found really odd. I kept it because I wanted to have my son’s team name put on it to wear to a chilly game that was coming up. But the quality control on this particular one wasn’t great.
Soft comfy and cute for niece

I was expecting a kangaroo pocket, which it doesn’t have. Very disappointed
This is so comfortable!
I love the length and fit of these sweater. It’s so comfy and is great for just lounging around or going out to run errands.
This is very cozy and comfortable material. It runs big so make sure that you don’t order a bigger size than you normally wear.
Good value
This is my favorite sweatshirt. The fleece lining is Amazing and I typically hate fleece. It’s almost cooling fleece. I love it so much.
True to size. Very cozy and cute.  Easy. Care.
The product hangs well on my body.  I was able to add a short top under it without looking uncomfortable.

I bought a small. It runs big. It fits awkward. The sleeves seem short, but they are big and poofy. The hood is huge and heavy so it constantly pulls the shirt back at the neck. It is warm tho, so I guess it serves its purpose.
Perfect light weight hoodie for cool temperatures.
This is a well made , warm sweatshirt. Cute tunic length.
Overall, I like it, but would LOVE it more with pockets on the side.
I bought this in a Ladies 2X, I love this baggie Hoodie! I wear it as a PJ top! So comfy! If I get cold in the middle of the night, I throw the hood on and I’m good till the morning!
I like this overall however it is not as soft as I had hoped and it has no pocket. I realize now the listing does not say anything about a pocket.  The sweater washed well and didn't shrink.

Very comfortable!
I was most disappointed to find out there were NO Kanga pockets as described in item details.  I was depending on those pockets to hold my cell phone while working.
I bought one, and loved it so much that I went back and bought 2 more!!
I did not care for this sweatshirt. It was thin and very oversized. I returned it.
Love the new sweatshirt it’s long and you can wear it with jeans or leggings!

Was looking for a comfortable hoodie to wear on cooler days. This works perfectly!! The hoodie is extremely comfortable and soft interior!! I got the small and I still have a nice amount of "room" as this is not clingy at all, which I prefer.... plus also, doesn't look like a sack of potatoes on me! Looks great with skinny jeans and tennis shoes, for a casual day out. Would totally recommend if you are looking for a comfortable hoodie, to lounge around in or wear out,. for running errands and such.

This shirt is super comfy, but you can go down a size or even two!  Also, there is no pocket like the headline states. I will miss that feature, but it allows for a better streamlined look. I went up a couple sizes because I wanted a bigger sweatshirt to lounge around in, but it is a little larger than expected. It won't shrink up because it's 50/50 cotton/poly.  I still love it!
Product advertizes kanga pocket. Doesnt have one.
Decent material & full bum coverage with leggins
Perfectly oversized, great with leggings, so soft warm and comfy! I got it for a great bargain price! Just overall one of the best pieces I've bought in a long long time!! Happy dance
Love the color but swallows me. Too Big. Too much trouble to sent back. I'll just wear it big.😃
I got it specifically, as opposed to getting others, because it said it had a pocket. It does not.

I like the way this sweatshirt fits. The length is good - not too long. It looks nice on and it is a nice material. It is a very comfortable weight material and it washes up well, too. No complaints.  I ended up buying 2 of them.
Very comfortable and warm.  I like that the hood doesn't "choke" me!  Love the color, too.
Comfy and warm

评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: Fit was roomy as expected.  The sleeves were too baggy for my liking.  I knew the material was cheap, but it was clear that it would fade quickly in the wash.
There is no kanga pocket.

Hanes never lets me down. Always a good value. I ordered one in 2x and one in 3x. The 2x is nicely oversized (I usually wear 18 or 1x) so it looks nice with leggings but not sloppy. The 3x is MUCH bigger and I love it for lounging around at home. Best of all, while the sleeves are cut with plenty of room, they're not overly long, so they stop at my wrist, usually I have to recut them so they don't drag over my hands. That was a pleasant surprise! Only thing I miss is a pocket. Wish they kept a kangaroo pocket or a side pocket.
It's very much true  to size. It's nice and thick. The price was fantastic
Easy to wash and comphy, good price

评论概述: Hanes got it going on hoodie
评论详情: Love this hoodie. Will be getting in all colors
Super soft and warm, well made and looks great on.

This good looking, soft, and durable sweatshirt is just what I was looking for.  I washed it before wearing it and it turned out looking and feeling very nice.  I wear a medium, but bought a large for the comfortable fit. It's soft and seems to be durable.  Just what I wanted and needed.
I LOVE THIS SWEATSHIRT! I don’t wear a shirt under it but it keeps me pretty warm!
Runs larger than I expected, but it's a very well made product!
Nice fit and very soft material. Washes up really well.

Hanes has come a long way. This is a comfortable hoodie. The material is soft and warm. Just the right amount of thickness. Sleeves are long enough. It’s a tunic type length, which I love. Great with leggings. It’s a little big in the stomach but I sized up to make sure it was broad enough across the shoulders and chest. Fit is true to size I’d say but I always size up one in sweatshirts. Especially brands like this.
What a great comfy sweatshirt.  I love the slit waist sides.
This was a good color and lightweight.
I love the warmth and comfort this provides.
Liked the length, it is very pink but that's ok with me.
